metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16237 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Dino before 2019-09-10 does not properly check the source of an MAM message in module/xep/0313_message_archive_management.vala.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16237` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dino-im - 0.0.git20180130-1ubuntu0.1
dino-im-common - 0.0.git20180130-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dino-im package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.0.git20180130-1ubuntu0.1').
